receiptBill of Lading Includes create with or without pickup request, update and cancel BOL operations.  List individual and multiple submitted BOLs.  Retrieve and email a BOL PDF, PAPS Label and Shipping Label.  API Documentation  Subscribe Now imageImaging Retrieve images for a single PRO #; image types include:  Bill of Lading, Delivery Receipt, Delivery Return Receipt, Customs Documents, Inspection Report, Letter of Authority and NMFC Certification.  API Documentation  Subscribe Now constructionLTL Shipping Tools Includes Transit Time Calculator, Service Center Locator and Lineal Foot Calculator operations.  API Documentation  Subscribe Now local_shippingPickup Request Includes create, view, list and cancel pickup request operations.  API Documentation  Subscribe Now calculateRating Includes both Rate Quote and Spot (Volume) Quote operations.  Allows for creation of a new quote, and view of existing quote by confirmation number or date range.  Special Services Info (GUR, G12, RRS)  API Documentation  Subscribe Now schemaShipment Tracking Retrieve single or multi- PRO shipment statuses from pickup to delivery, includes ability to access movement-specific history vs. full history  API Documentation  Subscribe Now Help CenterTerms of UsePrivacy PolicyTariff LibraryFuel Surchargelanguage English  Â© 2024 XPO, Inc.
